title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions: Upgrade your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash. This sleek desk offers ample storage with 4 drawers, including a file drawer and 3 box drawers. The slide-out keyboard tray adds convenience, while the medium-density fiberboard construction ensures durability. With a scratch and water spill-resistant finish, this desk is perfect for home or professional use. Plus, it's ANSI/BIFMA tested for performance standards. Assembly required, but in-home assembly service is available. Elevate your office with this stylish and functional desk today!

Elevate your office with this modern and functional desk today!
